text: The 2010 Southland Conference Baseball Tournament was held from May 26–29. The top eight regular season finishers of the league's twelve teams met in the double-elimination tournament held at Whataburger Field in Corpus Christi, Texas. The winner of the tournament, , earned the conference's automatic bid to the 2010 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. ==Seeding and format== The top eight finishers from the regular season were seeded one through eight. They played a two bracket, double-elimination tournament, with the winner of each bracket meeting in a single championship final. {|class=wikitable ! Team !! W !! L !! T !! Pct !!
